Translations.Text: Ai lie fu, lia mu, mi mu
Zhexie shi you zhihui de jingdian de jie wen
shi xingshan zhe de xiangdao he enhui
Xingshan zhe, jin shou bai gong, wan na tian ke, qie quexin houshi
Zhe deng ren, shi zunshou tamen de zhu de zhengdao de, zhe deng ren que shi chenggong de
Youren goumai wuwei de tanhua, yibian ta wu zhi wu shi di shi ren beili zhenzhu de zhengdao, erqie ba ta dang zuo xiaobing. Zhe deng ren, jiang shou lingru de xingfa
Youren dui ta xuandu wo de jixiang de shihou, ta zi dadi tuibi, fangfu meiyou tingjian yiyang, fangfu ta de liang er zhong ting yiyang. Ni yi tongku de xingfa, xiang ta baoxi ba
Xindao erqie xingshan zhe, bi jiang xiangshou ji leyuan
er yong ju qizhong. Zhe shi zhenzhu de zhenshi de yingxu, ta que shi wanneng de, que shi zhi rui de

Ta chuangzao zhu tian, er buyong nimen suo neng jian de zhizhu; ta zai da dishang anzhi xuduo shanyue, yimian da di dongyao, shi nimen bu'an; ta zai da dishang sanbu ge zhong dongwu. Ta cong yun zhong jiangxia yushui, er zai da dishang zisheng ge zhong youliang de zhiwu
Zhe shi zhenzhu suo chuangzao de, nimen zhishi wo ba. Nimen she zhenzhu er chongbai de (ouxiang) jiujing chuangzaole shenme ne? Buran, bu yi de ren shi zai mingxian de mi wu zhong de
